name: A Quest for Understanding: Defeat Astellarn while at least two pulsars are still active.
A Song of Ice and Ire IV: Defeat the Arch-Glacor at 500% enrage. (X/500)
A Song of Ice and Ire VII: Defeat the Arch-Glacor at 2,000% enrage.
Acid-washed: Defeat Araxxor and Araxxi while at most 10% of the total acid remains in the pool after taking the Acid path during phase 2.
Aerial Pursuit: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six without anyone being hit by Verac's 'Deathcopter' attack.
All Aboard: Defeat Kree'arra after allowing him to push you from one wall to another with his wing knockback. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
All Natural: Defeat the Har-Aken without using any crystals within the fight.
All Together Now: Defeat all four images of Yakamaru within ten seconds of one another.
Animal Cruelty: Have Durzag deal the killing blow to both Tuz and Krar.
Anti-anima-golem: Defeat Telos, the Warden at 100% or higher enrage without being hit by an anima-golem.
Anti-antifire: Defeat the King Black Dragon without using dragonfire protection to mitigate his attacks
Araxxi Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Araxxi solo in less than 05:00.
Araxxi Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Araxxi solo in less than 03:00.
Araxxi Master Speed Killer: Defeat Araxxi solo in less than 01:42.
Arc Reactor: Beat Seiryu without anyone taking damage from the shadow tendrils.
Arch-Glacor (HM) Elite Speed Killer: Defeat the Arch-Glacor in hard mode at 500% or higher enrage in less than 05:00.
Arch-Glacor (HM) Grandmaster Speed Killer: Defeat the Arch-Glacor in hard mode at 3000% or higher enrage in less than 05:30.
Arch-Glacor (HM) Master Speed Killer: Defeat the Arch-Glacor in hard mode at 1000% or higher enrage in less than 02:30.
Arch-Glacor Competent Speed Killer: Defeat the Arch-Glacor solo with all mechanics enabled in less than 03:00.
Are You Graardone yet?: Defeat General Graardor in hard mode, solo, without being hit by damage reflected by his 'Graardor Protect' attack.
Are You Winning, Zam? IV: Defeat Zamorak at 500% enrage in a solo encounter.
Are You Winning, Zam? VI: Defeat Zamorak at 1,000% enrage in a solo encounter.
Are You Winning, Zam? VII: Defeat Zamorak, Lord of Chaos solo at 2,000% enrage.
Around the Mound in Eighty Days: Defeat each of the original Barrows Brothers, without leaving the area.
Astellarn Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Astellarn solo in less than 01:30.
Astellarn Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Astellarn solo in less than 01:00.
Avaryss' Avarice: Defeat the Twin Furies solo without being hit by Avaryss' 'Surge' attack.
Bad Breath Day: Defeat Vermyx, Brood Mother without being hit by her 'Wyrmfire' attack.
Barrows: Rise of the Six (perfect): Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six while completing the listed achievements.
Barrows: Rise of the Six (solo): Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six solo.
Barrows: Rise of the Six Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six in a team of 4 or fewer in less than 01:00.
Barrows: Rise of the Six Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six in a team of 4 or fewer in less than 00:18.
Barrows: Rise of the Six Master Speed Killer: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six in a team of 4 or fewer in less than 00:06.
Beastmaster Durzag (duo): Defeat Beastmaster Durzag in a team of 2 or fewer.
Beastmaster Durzag (solo): Defeat Beastmaster Durzag solo.
Beastmaster Durzag Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Beastmaster Durzag in less than 01:45.
Beastmaster Durzag Grandmaster Speed Killer: Defeat Beastmaster Durzag in less than 00:27.
Beastmaster Durzag Master Speed Killer: Defeat Beastmaster Durzag in less than 00:45.
Beetlejuice Beetlejuice: Defeat the Kalphite King in a team of 4 or fewer without anyone dying to a 'Beetlejuice' attack.
Before You Go Aken: Defeat TzKal-Zuk in hard mode in a single run without letting TzekHaar-Aken submerge in wave 17.
Best Offence: Defeat the Kalphite King after triggering his Immortality and then defeat him again.
Better Not Touch: Defeat Yakamaru with all but one member of the raid still poisoned.
Between a Rock and a Graard-place: Defeat General Graardor in hard mode, solo, without taking damage from his 'Graardor Smash' attack.
Black Stone Dragon Competent Speed Killer: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon solo in less than 05:30.
Black Stone Dragon Elite Speed Killer: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon solo in less than 04:00.
Black Stone Dragon Grandmaster Speed Killer: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon solo in less than 01:45.
Black Stone Dragon Master Speed Killer: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon solo in less than 02:15.
Blade Dancer: Defeat Gregorovic solo without being hit by his 'Glaives' attack.
Bleed Tank: Defeat Vorago with only one person ever being the target of the 'Destroy Tank' attack during the 'Vitalis Bomb' stage.
Blessing Denied: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove without anyone using the 'Nature's Blessing' action ability.
Blight the Way with Eruptions: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove after dealing with all eruptions within 6s of each other.
Bomb disposal unit: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer after placing each 'Mark of the Elements' in the center of the arena.
Bombing Run: Defeat Verak Lith without being hit by their 'Black Dragon Dive Bomb' attack.
Bouncing Around: Defeat the Twin Furies in hard mode, solo, without being hit by their 'Lava Bomb' attack.
Bring the Roof Down, But Not On Me: Defeat Vorago without anyone being hit by any falling rocks during the 'Ceiling Collapse' stage.
Broodmother: Defeat Verak Lith without anyone dispersing their damage into a pile of eggs.
Brothers in More Arms: Defeat Rise of the Six on six different occasions, leaving a different brother to last.
Burn, Fury, Burn: Defeat the Twin Furies without dealing damage during their channeled[sic] bomb attack. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
Burrowed Time: Defeat the Kalphite King in a team of 4 or fewer without anyone being hit by any of his 'Burrow' attacks.
Caged Souls: Defeat Kezalam, the Wanderer without being hit by her 'Soul Bomb' attack.
Calculated: Defeat Vorago without anyone activating any of the magic and explosive bombs during the 'The End' stage.
Can't Touch This: Defeat Kerapac, the bound without getting hit by his 'Lightning Strike' attack.
Can't touch this I: Defeat Zamorak, Lord of Chaos at 250% or higher enrage without letting him use a special attack.
Can't touch this II: Defeat Zamorak, Lord of Chaos at 500% or higher enrage without letting him use a special attack.
Can't touch this III: Defeat Zamorak, Lord of Chaos at 750% or higher enrage without letting him use a special attack.
Canon Event: Defeat Kerapac, the bound in hard mode, solo with at least 3 active time thread tears.
Champion of the Goebies: Complete the Liberation of Mazcab raid in a single run without anyone dying, leaving or banking while completing the listed achievements.
Charging Up: Defeat the Kalphite King in a team of 4 or fewer without anyone being hit by any of his 'Charge' attacks.
Chill To The Bone I: Defeat the Arch-Glacor in hard mode for a 100 killstreak.
Chill To The Bone II: Defeat the Arch-Glacor in hard mode for a 200 killstreak.
Classic Dragon Killing: Defeat Vindicta & Gorvek solo whilst having equipped a shield that provides protection against dragonfire.
Classic Rock: Defeat Vorago without using any defensive abilities.
Cleaning Up the Shadows: Defeat Raksha, the Shadow Colossus after entering phase 4 with no active shadow pools.
Cleansing is For the Weak: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove without anyone being cleansed by Merethiel.
Cleaving the Way: Defeat Araxxor and Araxxi without anyone being hit by their 'Cleave' attack.
Clenched: Defeat the Ambassador without destroying any sinister fragments.
Cold Spell: Defeat Nex solo, without being hit by her 'Contain' and 'Ice Prison' attacks during her Ice phase.
Comeback kid: Defeat Vorago after being pushed close to the edge of the arena during the 'Finale' stage.
Commander Zilyana (HM) Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Commander Zilyana in hard mode, solo, in less than 01:15.
Commander Zilyana (HM) Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Commander Zilyana in hard mode, solo, in less than 00:42.
Commander Zilyana Beginner Speed Killer: Defeat Commander Zilyana solo in less than 01:00.
Commander Zilyana Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Commander Zilyana solo in less than 00:30.
Connection lost. Please wait - attempting to reestablish: Defeat Rasial, the First Necromancer without moving for 45s after being hit by his 'Finger of Death' attack in phase 4.
Conqueror of Chaos: Complete a full run of The Zamorakian undercity and defeat Zamorak. (X/1)
Cool People Don't Look At Explosions: Defeat the Twin Furies solo without being hit by their 'Explosion' attack.
Core Problem: Defeat the Corporeal Beast without being hit by the Dark Energy Core. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
Cormes and Goes: Defeat Durzag without killing Cormes.
Corporeal Beast Beginner Speed Killer: Defeat the Corporeal Beast solo in less than 01:00.
Corporeal Beast Competent Speed Killer: Defeat the Corporeal Beast solo in less than 00:30.
Coursing Through You: Defeat Telos, the Warden at 100% or higher enrage after taking the full damage of the virus in phase 5.
Crassian Leviathan Competent Speed Killer: Defeat Crassian Leviathan solo in less than 02:30.
Crassian Leviathan Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Crassian Leviathan solo in less than 01:30.
Crassian en Masse: Defeat the Sanctum Guardian with exactly 10 crassians still alive when she dies.
Crawfish Boil: Disintegrate 12 crassian ritual keepers simultaneously during the Ambassador encounter.
Culling the Blight: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove after defeating his Blight afflicted core in a single exposure.
Currently Shockproof: Defeat Pthentraken solo after mitigating her 'Converging Lightning' attack using insulated boots.
Day at the Aquarium: Defeat Yakamaru with one durable jellyfish and one reflecting jellyfish still alive.
Day at the Pound: Defeat Durzag without opening any of the charger cages in the arena walls.
Dealing with Scarabs: Defeat Nakatra, Devourer Eternal without letting any Corrupted scarab healer reach her or Volatile scarab akh explode.
Definitely Can't Touch This: Defeat Kerapac, the bound in hard mode without being hit by his 'Lightning Strike' attack.
Dextrous Crystal: Defeat Taraket the Necromancer while the bloated monstrosity is still alive.
Did It For Them: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without allowing any of the 'Unstable Smoke' crystals to explode.
Did You Say Something?: Defeat Osseous solo without being stunned by her 'Roar' attack.
Did you feel that?: Defeat the Queen Black Dragon after surviving a full time stop special attack.
Do Not Return To Sender: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without letting any reavers be absorbed.
Don't Go Ballistic: Defeat Zemouregal & Vorkath in hard mode without using the ballista.
Don't Let Him Sweep the Leg: Defeat Raksha, the Shadow Colossus without letting him use his 'Tail Sweep' attack in phase 4.
Don't Let Your Prayers Expire: Defeat Verak Lith after using the correct protection prayer against all of his 'Spire' attacks.
Don't Need No Help: Defeat Zemouregal & Vorkath without triggering the optional rituals.
Don't touch that!: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without anyone activating the 'Unstable Smoke' crystal.
Double Swoop: Defeat Kree'arra solo after defeating all of his lieutenants twice.
Dragonhide Infanticide: Defeat Verak Lith while ensuring every ricocheted attack is absorbed and dispersed into a pile of eggs.
Dry as a Bone: Defeat Vorago without anyone hiding behind a waterfall during stage 4.
Dry-ish: Defeat Araxxor and Araxxi while at least 40% (Duo: 80%) of the total acid remains in the pool after taking the Acid path during phase 2.
Excuse Me, That's My Seat: Complete a hardmode flawless run by defeating TzKal-Zuk in a single attempt after completing all of his challenges.
Extinction Event: Defeat the Rex Matriarchs, Pthentraken, Orikalka, and Rathis, all within 5 seconds of each other. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
Feeling Flameproof: Defeat the King Black Dragon while using dragonfire protection to mitigate his attacks.
Feeling a Little Venomous Today: Defeat Rathis solo after stopping her from healing during her 'Poison absorption' attack.
Finish Him!: Personally defeat Vorago with the Maul of Omens.
Flipping the Script: Defeat TzKal-Zuk in hard mode in a single run after defeating all Igneous minions in reverse order during his 'Infernal Rain' attack in wave 18.
Floor is Larval: Defeat Queen Black Dragon after killing 30 grotworms during the fight. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
Flow State (achievement): Defeat Raksha, the Shadow Colossus after using the correct protection prayer against all of his basic attacks.
Fonts of All Knowledge I: Defeat Telos, the Warden at 100% or higher enrage after charging and using all fonts in phase 5.
Fonts of All Knowledge II: Defeat Telos, the Warden at 1000% or higher enrage after charging and using all fonts in phase 5.
Force of a Great Typhoon: Defeat Masuta the Ascended without any stacks of the calm waters effect.
Four in Hand: Defeat all 4 black hands, within 10 seconds after defeating the first, during the Black Stone Dragon fight.
Free Spirits: Defeat Gregorovic solo without allowing him to absorb any spirits.
Freeze Frame: Defeat Vorago without Vorago moving and without anyone moving during the 'Vitalis' stage.
Ful of Energy but Nowhere to Go: Defeat TzKal-Zuk in hard mode in a single run without moving after attacking the 'Conduit of Ful' in wave 18.
Gas Detector: Defeat Vorago without anyone being hit by a Gas Cloud attack during the 'Green Bomb' stage.

Glutton for Punishment: Get the Corporeal Beast to devour a variety of delicious familiars. Can only be completed in a solo instance. (X/7)
Gong Maintenance Expert: Defeat Durzag with all gongs repaired but un-used.
Good Enough for a Goblin: Defeat Corporeal Beast using only a bronze spear. Can only be completed in a solo instance.
Gorilla Warfare: Defeat Nakatra, Devourer Eternal in hard mode after defeating both Shadowsands gorilla akhs.
Green Thumb: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove after letting all spore bombs hit the ground during his 'Earthen Seed' attack.

Hammer Down: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six without anyone being hit by Torag's 'Whack' attack.
Hand To Heal: Defeat the Ambassador without allowing him to heal from his 'Circle of Black Hands' attack.
Hand in Hand: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon without anyone being hit by her 'Grasping Hands' attack.
Happy Trails: Defeat the Ambassador without anyone taking any damage from his 'Black Stone Flames' attack.

Harassing the Crassian: Defeat the Crassian Leviathan after allowing it to fully regenerate from below half health.
Heal or No Heal: Defeat TzTok-Jad without killing any Yt-HurKot.
Healing Denied: Defeat Nakatra, Devourer Eternal in hard mode without letting her heal Nefthys, the Split Soul.
Healing for Days: Defeat Vermyx, Brood Mother without letting any Corrupted scarab healer reach her.
Healing in the Name of Bleeds: Defeat Nex solo, after allowing her to fully heal during her Blood phase.
Heatproof: Defeat Zemouregal & Vorkath in hard mode without using any form of dragonfire protection.

Icy-them-coming: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without anyone taking damage from her 'Icicle Slam' attack.

In and Out: Defeat Kezalam, the Wanderer without being hit by her 'Sanctum Blast' attack.

Nex, Angel of Death (unorthodox): Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 5 or fewer without anyone dying while completing the listed achievements.
Nex, Angel of Death Elite Speed Killer: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer in less than 02:30.
Nex, Angel of Death Grandmaster Speed Killer: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer in less than 01:06.
Nex, Angel of Death Master Speed Killer: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer in less than 01:21.
Next to No Power: Defeat Nex without the use of prayers by anyone in the group.
No Bombs Allowed: Defeat Raksha, the Shadow Colossus without letting him use his 'Shadow Bomb' attack in phase 4.
No Friendly Fire: Defeat Vorago without anyone being hit by damage reflected by his 'Target Link' attack.
No smoking: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without anyone taking damage from her 'Smoke Blades' attack.
Not Mushroom to Move: Defeat Helwyr solo without moving.
Not a Moth: Defeat the Black Stone Dragon without taking damage from any shadow flames.
Oh Ye of Little Faith: Defeat any of the Barrows brothers after using the correct protection prayer against all of their basic attacks.
One At a Time: Defeat Kerapac, the bound in hard mode, without letting him jump more than once each phase from his 'Jumping Slam' attack.
One Hop This Time: Defeat Seiryu solo without jumping onto his manacles more than once.
One for All: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer without more than one player getting caught in her 'Elemental Lockdown' attack.
Orange You Glad I didn't say Blue?: Defeat the Kalphite King in a team of 4 or fewer without anyone being hit by any of his orange 'Bomb' attacks.
Out of Orbit: Defeat Astellarn the First Celestial without anyone stabilizing a wyrmhole.
Outflanked 'em in the Sanctum: Defeat the Sanctum Guardian without anyone taking any damage from her purple corruption.
Parkour!: Defeat Vorago after personally jumping onto Vorago's back in stage 1 in under 35 seconds.
Paying No Mind to His Mind: Defeat Solak, Guardian of the Grove without anyone entering his mind in phase 4.
Permanent Exile: Defeat the exiled Kalphite Queen solo.
Poppin' pillars: Defeat Nex, Angel of Death in a team of 7 or fewer after defeating all four pillars within 15 seconds.
Portal Bomb: Defeat Barrows: Rise of the Six without anyone being hit by Karil's 'Bombard' attack.
Prison Riot: Have at least one goebie survive the fight with Durzag.
Pruning the Timeline: Defeat Kerapac, the bound in hard mode, solo after dealing with all echos of Kerapac within 9s of each other.
